Entries.summer_Sat: Don't overwork yourself or you might end up in Harriet's clinic!

Entries.Introduction: It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm Harriet, the local doctor.#$e#I perform regular check-ups and medical procedures for all the residents of Pelican Town. It's rewarding work.#$e#I hope you'll find your own work equally rewarding, in time.$h
Entries.Fri4: If you want to hang out in my apartment, that's okay with me. I live above the clinic.
Entries.eventSeen_56_memory_twoweeks: I tried making my own pickles one time...$s#$e#Um, let me put it this way... The frogs we dissected in high school smelled like roses in comparison...
Entries.eventSeen_56: As a small town doctor, you can't help but form a personal connection with your patients. That can be both good and bad...
Entries.married_Harvey: This is the happiest moment of my life...$l
Entries.fall_Fri: Have you been going into the mines, @?#$e#It's a dangerous place. I recommend against it.
Entries.winter_Wed: It's flu season, so you'd better be extra careful.#$e#Make sure to wash your hands often.
Entries.winter_Sun: I hate to say this, but I do make a lot more money during flu season.#$e#I guess if people stopped getting sick, I'd be out of business.#$e#Don't get the wrong idea! I want people to be healthy... really!

Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I made us a nice healthy dinner. Only fresh, wholesome ingredients from the valley! [212 214 225 209 200]$h#$e#Just make sure to eat a reasonable portion, dear.
Entries.Outdoor_2: I may not be the most exciting girl, but I'll stay loyal to you for the rest of my life.$l
Entries.OneKid_3: So far, I really like being a mother!$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: My life is devoted to you and the children now, and I'm very happy about it. I always dreamed of having a wonderful family.$l#$e#I had nightmares of being a bachelorette forever.... I love you so much.$l
Entries.Good_2: I knew you were the one from the moment you moved here... $l^I knew you were the one from the moment you moved here...$l
Entries.summer_27: As summer draws to a close, and the colder season begins, my workload tends to increase. Sorry in advance if I'm a little moody...

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I wonder if Maru and Dr. Harriet will ever get together? I'm sure Harriet likes her...#$e#I think Maru will have to make the first move, though.$h
I wonder if Micah and Dr. Harriet will ever get together? I'm sure Harriet likes him...#$e#I think Micah will have to make the first move, though.$h

Entries.Wed: On Tuesdays and Thursdays I work at Harriet's clinic.#$b#She says she likes having me around in case her medical equipment goes haywire!$h#$e#Being a farmer must be pretty easy, huh?
Entries.Wed8: I work at Harriet's clinic on Tuesdays and Thursdays.#$e#She's nice, but not really my type...

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Harvey: When I'm next to you, I'm not even scared of falling off this cliff and dashing onto the sharp rocks below...$l"/jump Harvey/shake Harvey 1000/pause 1000/speak Harvey "...$8#$b#I... I love and admire you very much, @...$l

Entries.harveyBalloon: @,^I have a surprise for you. Meet me by the railroad tracks. ^   -Harriet[#]Harriet's Surprise
Entries.passedOut3_Billed: @,^Someone dropped you off at the clinic last night. You'd passed out from exhaustion!^You've got to take better care of yourself and go to bed at a reasonable hour.^I've billed you {0}g to cover your medical expenses.^^-Dr. Harriet[#]From The Office Of Dr. Harriet
Entries.passedOut3_NotBilled: @,^Someone dropped you off at the clinic last night. You'd passed out from exhaustion!^You've got to take better care of yourself and go to bed at a reasonable hour.^Since you have no money, I provided your medical care free of charge.^^-Dr. Harriet[#]Harriet's Free Medical Service

Entries.7: It's a page from someone's diary...^^...There are only a few 'older' bachelors and bachelorettes in town, and none of them are perfect! Harriet is really anxious and weak, but I know she would make a loyal and devoted husband. She likes coffee and pickles.^^Elliott is a bit foppish and melodramatic, but he does have a nice chin. He likes crab cakes and pomegranates.^^Shane is messy and anti-social. But I think his gruff exterior is a defense mechanism, insulating his softness from the world. He likes Beer, Pizza, and Pepper Poppers.%revealtasteHarvey395%revealtasteHarvey342%revealtasteElliott732%revealtasteElliott637%revealtasteShane346%revealtasteShane206%revealtasteShane215

Entries.Event.cs.1070: I have no money, but Harriet was obligated to save my life free of charge.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13446: A paste of fresh {0} makes a wonderful tonic for {1}. If you find one, I could put it to good use.       -Dr. Harriet

Entries.Hospital.3: It's probably not a good idea to stick your hands in there. It's full of used syringes, dirty swabs, and little nozzles that Harriet stuck into people's ears.

Entries.HarveysMallet_Description: It brings back memories of Harvey's clinic.

I wanted to make you a special dinner."/emote farmer 20/speak Harvey "It's my very own 'angel hair pasta primavera'... with clams!$h"/animate Harvey false true 300 51 52/pause 300/playSound eat/pause 600/playSound eat/pause 600/playSound eat/pause 500/animate Harvey false true 100 51/quickQuestion #It tastes heavenly#It tastes healthy#It tastes watery#It tastes burnt#It tastes like your moustache#It tastes like fungus(break)speak Harvey "Heavenly, huh? That must be the 'angel hair'!$h#$b#I'm glad you like it! You deserve the best.$l"(break)speak Harvey "Oh yes, I forgot to mention... it's 'whole wheat' pasta. And it's brimming with fresh vegetables.#$b#It's important that you eat healthy food! I want you to live forever...$l"(break)speak Harvey "Oh... I see. I knew I needed to add more salt.$s#$b#Well, at least you'll be well hydrated.$s"(break)emote Harvey 28\speak Harvey "Oh... I thought I gave myself the burnt one.$s#$b#Um, I lost track of one the pans and it caught fire... Sorry, dear.$s"(break)jump Harvey\pause 500\speak Harvey "Uhhh...! Heh. I guess a piece of my hair may have fallen into the pasta...$8#$b#Well! Extra fiber, right? Heh... (sorry honey)$8"(break)jump Harvey\pause 400\speak Harvey "Oh! Eh... Must've been the truffle oil I drizzled on top...$8#$b#You meant delicious, edible fungus... right honey? Of course... Heh.$8"/pause 2000/animate Harvey false true 300 51 52/speak Harvey "So, tell me about your day..."/quickQuestion #I tended the farm#I dug around in the caves#I spent the day fishing#I socialized in town#I did a little of everything#I can't remember#I didn't do anything(break)speak Harvey "Yes, I can still see the dirt in your hair! I really appreciate all the hard work you do, honey."(break)speak Harvey "That sounds dangerous... are you sure that's safe?$8#$b#I don't want to see you on the operating table anytime soon...$s#$b#Although I have to say, I like how courageous you are...$l"(break)speak Harvey "A peaceful day by the water, huh? That sounds very relaxing.#$b#I'm glad you're having fun out there!$h"(break)speak Harvey "Ah, that's good. Having an active social life is healthy for the brain.#$b#But remember, I'm always here for you if you need someone to talk to!$l"(break)speak Harvey "That makes sense. There's lots to do in this valley! ...And I know how hard you work.#$b#Just remember to take breaks! When you're so busy, it's easy to get burnt out from exhaustion."(break)speak Harvey "Ah... I have that problem, too. The boundary between days can blur together... it's hard to keep track of everything!"(break)speak Harvey "Took the day off, huh? I'm glad to hear it.#$b#Well, with a day off and a hearty dinner you'll be fully re-charged for tomorrow."/pause 1000/stopAnimation Harvey/showFrame Harvey 51/speak Harvey "Whew... I'm stuffed! That was great..."/emote farmer 20/pause 1000/playMusic nightTime/speak Harvey "I'll take care of the dishes..."/pause 400/emote farmer 60/pause 250/speak Harvey "Don't feel bad... I like to do nice things for you! It makes me happy."/pause 1000/speak Harvey "I know I say this a lot, but... marrying you was the best thing that ever happened to me!$l"/emote farmer 20/pause 1000/fade/viewport -100 -100/end dialogue Harvey "That was filling. I'm gonna sleep well..."

Entries.fall_25.002: Excuse me, I have to say some things to Doctor Harriet in private...$u

Entries.summer_25.001: Doctor Harriet, have you read the latest 'Biology and Medicine'? There's an article I think you'd be interested in.

Entries.23.0: Now now, dear... It's important that Doctor Harriet takes a good look at you. She's a nice young woman! Behave yourself, for your dear old wife's sake.

Entries.winter_15.000: Winter can be a dreary season, but events like this make it a little brighter!

Entries.winter_18.001: Can you show me how this tool works, Doctor Harriet?

Entries.spring_11.002: Doctor Harriet? I'm worried about Vincent's height. Isn't he a little short for his age?

Entries.spring_16.001: Do I look healthy, Doctor Harriet?

Entries.fall_9.000: Erm... Doctor Harriet? This is completely confidential, right?

Entries.fall_18.000: Erm... Doctor Harriet? This is completely confidential, right?
Entries.winter_18.002: Erm... Doctor Harriet? When you give her the shots, can we have two lollipops?

Entries.summer_4.000: Dammit... I almost forgot. I have to go see Doctor Harriet today.
